QuestData.Title: Raggaran's Fury
QuestData.Description: I will not rest until they're defeated! Slay them all!$b$b<Raggaran catches his breath.>$b$bTheir stinking lairs are to the north, or to the southwest!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Razormane Dustrunners and 5 Razormane Battleguards.
QuestData.RewardText: <Again, Raggaran appears calmer.>$b$bYou've done well, stranger.$b$bI'm sorry you had to see me like that. Thank you for killing the quilboar, but maybe you should leave before I fly into another one of my rages.
